alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 1:50AM MST until February 17 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Snowy Range and North Snowy Range Foothills including Interstate 80 near Arlington and Elk Mountain. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; Snowy Range
